attributes.action: Put on all supermarket meat products the harmful effects, just like Tobacco
attributes.additional_details:
This Petition is in response from the 40,000 Amazonian fires that have been going on this year and to send a message to Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro! There have been 72,843 in brazil alone. It's reported that some of the land will be used for cattle pastures and planting.

The Amazon is the world’s largest and diverse tract of rainforest, with millions of species and billions of trees. It stores vast amounts of planet-warming carbon dioxide and produces 6 percent of the planet’s oxygen.
attributes.background: 40% of global emissions come from livestock. People need to know what effects it can do to the planet. The petition is about creating more awareness and making people think twice before buying. If we have to collectively change our diet and reduce industrial agricultural farming then lets do it!
